name: Mini Boss
description:
Loupe: a small magnifying glass

Don't you love the long, drawn out boss speeches in every video game? Well this is just the game for you!

Use extreme patience and listen to their boring description of taking over the world or don't! You can always use your magnifying glass as a weapon you know and drown out their mini speech.

Music done by https://jondaremusic.itch.io/

More work by jonedaremusic - https://jondaremusic.bandcamp.com/album/mini-boss-official-soundtrack
